chapters.title: Chapter 23: Ornaments
chapters.info: Emarin Pendaloan, p. 541 (653)—Algarin's late younger brother. He could channel, and was captured and taken to Tar Valon by Cadsuane. He survived being gentled for over ten years, which is much longer than usual—Algarin was very grateful to Cadsuane for this. See also Pendaloan, Algarin.
